## LoaderOptions.loadersGlGltf property

When viewing b3dm (mesh) tiles, use the loaders.gl GLTFLoader rather than the Three.hs GLTFLoader - Default: `true`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
loadersGlGltf?: boolean;
```
